tool_description: a simple api which returns a catfact
name: Meowfacts
title: Meowfacts

api_list.name: defaultRoot
api_list.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can recieve a specific or more than one fact.

optional_parameters.name: factID
optional_parameters.description: pass an optional id to call a specific fact

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: requested locale to retrieve the cat fact in.

api_list.name: options
api_list.description: This endpoint will list all languages available to the root endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://meowfacts.p.rapidapi.com/options"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meowfacts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: healthcheck
api_list.description: The health check endpoint will return a status of 200 if the api is up and ready to recieve connections. It will tell the uptime, and total requests served since last restart. It also has a field for version which corresponds to the versioned release from the github repo.
